page.title: 15RECREATIONS.
page.content: The main leisure activities are fishing,riding and walking. The canal is very popular for angling and walking. It is well stocked with roach,golden bream,silver bream,chubb, eels,and pike.Fishing competitions are held regularly.There is a whippet racing track next to the canal opposite the only public house in our map block.The British Whippet Assoc. Races are held here.There are l27 dogs using the track.The canal has weirs at the site of the old lock gates and is conduited under the now dismantled goods/ironstone railway.The Trent River Authority sends a pollution officer every month to check the oxygen level,water temperature and take samples for laboratory tests for chemicals.Temperature on June 27th. was l7 deg C.Popular with anglers Denton Reservoir replenishes canal.
